ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] ACK!
ygData.msgSnippet: I m just waiting for the dark elves to take over Freeport.... now THAT will be fun, hehe. Tony  wrote:I don t play EQ for a couple weeks
ygData.messageBody:
I'm just waiting for the dark elves to take over Freeport.... now THAT will be fun, hehe.

 Tony <tonyraye@...> wrote:

I don't play EQ for a couple weeks and I come back to find out my home town
has been overrun by FROGGIES... You know HOW MANY froggies I had ta eat
when I was a little troll? I'm sick and tired of the things... Always
jumpin around, trying ta kill little trolls...Now they invade MY hometown.
My family has been ousted, made to eek out an existance collecting swamp
scum and snake oil.... I WILL exact my revenge! I now have a purpose!

   The upside is, if I have to go to Neriak, there is a lot of dark meat
running around, and I've got this new sauce I've been meaning to try....
This might not be so bad...

   Gilauk Gatorslayer
